tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE leed_certifications (
  certification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  certification_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  certification_level VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  building_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES green_buildings(building_id)
);

CREATE TABLE buildings (
    building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_name VARCHAR(255),
    leed_certification_status VARCHAR(50),
    certification_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE floors (
    floor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT,
    floor_number INT,
    area_sqft FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE leed_categories (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE building_leed_category (
    building_id INT,
    category_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE Buildings (
    building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL,
    zip_code VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    leed_certification_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Certifications (
    certification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT NOT NULL,
    category_id INT NOT NULL,
    certification_date DATE,
    expiry_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES Buildings(building_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES LEEDCategories(category_id)
);
